title: Stage Lv10-S17
description: Level 10 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: You're right, but please understand my position too.
Sure, that could be the case, but there are other possibilities too.
learning_points: Level 10 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 네 말이 맞긴 하지만, 내 입장도 이해해 줘.
sentences.en: You're right, but please understand my position too.

sentences.kr: 물론 그럴 수도 있지만, 다른 가능성도 있어.
sentences.en: Sure, that could be the case, but there are other possibilities too.

sentences.kr: 인정해, 좋은 지적이야. 하지만 여전히 의문이 남아.
sentences.en: I'll give you that, it's a good point. But I still have doubts.

sentences.kr: 그래, 틀렸어. 하지만 그렇게 생각할 만했어.
sentences.en: Yeah, I was wrong. But it was reasonable to think that way.

sentences.kr: 맞아, 내가 놓친 부분이 있어. 그래도 전체적으론...
sentences.en: You're right, I missed something there. Still, overall...

sentences.kr: 좋은 의견이야. 다만, 현실적인 문제가 있어.
sentences.en: That's a good suggestion. It's just that there are practical issues.

sentences.kr: 동의해, 이상적으로는 그래야 해. 하지만 현실은...
sentences.en: I agree, ideally that's how it should be. But in reality...

sentences.kr: 네 관점에서 보면 그럴 수 있어. 내 경우는 좀 달라.
sentences.en: From your perspective, I can see that. In my case, it's a bit different.
